oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Model 1840 dragoon saber
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Model 1840 dragoon saber, marked on the obverse ricasso "cordts". On the reverse ricasso is found the German manufacturer mark of "SOLINGEN". This is a standard model, the leather grips have been replaced. This model was commonly called "the wristbreaker" because of its heavy weight and was issued to both Federal and Confederate cavalrymen.
